siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Create awesome effects like skeuomorph, neon, glitch, glass, and more - right in Figma! One-click transforms, adjust properties with ease, mix & match. Go creative! Available for free in the Figma community.
blogPost.body: Create awesome effects like skeuomorph, neon, glitch, glass, and more - right in Figma! One-click transforms, adjust properties with ease, mix & match. Go creative! Available for free in the Figma community.
blogPost.title: Morph Plugin for Figma - Create awesome effects right in Figma
blogPost.author: milan maheshwari

localize.description: 在Figma中创建超棒的效果，如Skeuomorph、霓虹灯、闪光、玻璃等--就在Figma中！一键变换，轻松调整属性，混合匹配。一键转换，轻松调整属性，混合和匹配。发挥创意吧 可在 Figma 社区免费使用。
localize.tagline: 在Figma中直接创建超棒的效果

localize.description: 在Figma中創建超棒的效果，如Skeuomorph、霓虹燈、閃光、玻璃等--就在Figma中！一鍵變換，輕鬆調整屬性，混合匹配。一鍵轉換，輕鬆調整屬性，混合和匹配。發揮創意吧 可在 Figma 社區免費使用。
localize.tagline: 在Figma中直接創建超棒的效果

previous.excerpt: LecturePro is a notes-assistant that helps students pay attention in class. It listens to the lecture with you, and also takes notes for you. You can download these notes and edit as well!
previous.title: Lecture Pro - Notes-assistant for students across the globe!

localize.description: LecturePro是一款帮助学生在课堂上专心听讲的笔记助手。它和你一起听课，还能为你做笔记。你可以下载这些笔记，也可以进行编辑!
LecturePro是一款幫助學生在課堂上專心聽講的筆記助手。它和你一起聽課，還能爲你做筆記。你可以下載這些筆記，也可以進行編輯!

next.excerpt: Job Description is an AI-based service utilising GPT-3 to generate high-quality professional job descriptions for businesses attracting the best talent. Generate professional job descriptions in seconds. No previous writing experience required.
next.title: Job Description AI - Create professional job descriptions in seconds using AI

localize.description: 职位描述是一个基于人工智能的服务，利用GPT-3生成高质量的专业职位描述，为企业吸引优秀人才。几秒钟就能生成专业的职位描述。无需以往的写作经验。
localize.tagline: 使用AI在几秒钟内创建专业的工作描述

localize.description: 職位描述是一個基於人工智能的服務，利用GPT-3生成高質量的專業職位描述，爲企業吸引優秀人才。幾秒鐘就能生成專業的職位描述。無需以往的寫作經驗。
localize.tagline: 使用AI在幾秒鐘內創建專業的工作描述
